resources.string: Please wait. Uploading is in progress .
File size should be less then 5 Gb.

string.name: faq_terms_of_service_and_privacy_policy
string.a: FAQ, Terms of Service and Privacy policy

resources.string:
The application allows you to share files (videos, pictures, etc.) using the Android method to Share.
 Files are stored on the File.io server (by default for 2 weeks).
 The limit for one file is 5 gigabytes.
 After the link is used, the file is automatically deleted from the server.
 After the file is uploaded to the server, the link is automatically copied to the clipboard.
 It is also possible to copy / share the link using notifications.

 Thanks to File.io for their service!
file size should be less then 5 Gb.
